author: Dr. Joseph Eure
context: Assistant Principal, John Adams Middle School
quote: TCS leveled the playing field and gave these skills and opportunities to all students – regardless of economic ability. The Coding School provides outstanding instruction with an equal opportunity to all students who wouldn’t have these opportunities otherwise.

author: Ireland
quote: Last school year, at my school, your company ran two classes on Python and HTML and CSS. I loved them so much and they were so fun that coding is now one of my favorite hobbies. A dream of mine now, is to take on computer science as a profession.

author: Benjamin
quote: I didn’t know what coding was before this class. I liked how I got to create my own website.

author: Angel
quote: The best thing about The Coding School class is that it was helpful because now I want to become an Engineer.
Do you know when you might start registering kiddos for this upcoming school year, or what classes you guys will be teaching? As someone in tech, I think what you guys are doing is really inspiring!

author: Dr. Martin Powers
quote: I want to thank The Coding School for the opportunity for my 4th, 5th, & 6th grade students to learn computer coding from your fantastic college student instructors. School attendance on days with coding was improved, students loved being involved and growing new skills as well as the role modeling to my students from the college instructors

author: Sean Alstott
context: Assistant Principal, Lincoln Middle School/Morro Bay High School
quote: First off, thanks so much for introducing Lincoln Middle School to coding! The kids have had a great time and parents are ecstatic to have their kids become computer engineers.

I have twin 6th grade boys with learning disabilities, and since they began taking coding classes there has been improvement in their other academic subjects. It has helped them concentrate and really learn to focus. They now want to go into engineering and mathematics. Thank you for giving our children here at JAMS [this] opportunity.

author: Anthony Mirand
quote: I wish I had learned coding earlier. In beginning college computer science courses you are thrown in and expected to know so much already. These kids we’re teaching now have a huge advantage -- they’ll have the solid foundation and ability to build their knowledge from the ground up -- helping them understand and learn so much more so much easier. The beneficial impact this [education at a young age] will have on them is immeasurable.
